name: Disco Fitter
description:
Your goal is to collect as much currency (λ-credits) as possible during the game - just over 2 minutes of gameplay.

You work as a mechanic right next to a Disco party in a futuristic world. Everything around permeates with rhythm, even the cyber-hands you're fixing. So in addition to picking the right tool for repair, you'll gain more style and therefore more λ-credits if you do it to the beat of the music and your surroundings.


Controls
Q W E R - Picking tools
Space - Catching Credits (if you follow the beat you'll get more)

Sound
There is music - it just starts when you start gameplay :)


How to?
If you've read the above, you already understand the game - you don't need to read this big description below :)

However if you want to know the details, here are they:
First of all Rhythm is more important than being perfect - you get the lion's share of credits for even selecting a tool on time. However if you want the highest possible result you should try to choose the tool at the end of the bit - then the color of the cyber-hand is the brightest. Speaking of colors, there is also some currency for choosing the right tool (in the same color).
In addition, after each cyber-hand (consisting of 4 repairs) you get a payment and here only the perfect "catching" (using the Space key) counts - this will increase its value.

Okay, the long description behind there is still a specific list of "how get λ-credits":
30 C - Tool selection itself (large time window)
10 C - Color matching (Color can be changed if there is still time)
10 C - Selecting the color only in the sweet spot (small time window)

10 C - Award received for each hand
30 C - Catching rewarn in sweet spot

Game is from Game Jam
There are minor lacks :)
